description: Python virtual environment detection and management for SenWeaver IDE
config.defaultInterpreterPath: Path to the default Python interpreter
config.pythonPath: Path to the Python interpreter (deprecated, use defaultInterpreterPath)
config.venvPath: Path to folder with a list of Virtual Environments
config.venvFolders: Folder names to look for virtual environments
config.autoDetectVirtualEnvs: Automatically detect virtual environments in the workspace
config.languageServer: Language server to use (set to None when using basedpyright)
